alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 21 at 2:21AM CDT until October 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON... .The combination of low relative humidity and gusty winds this afternoon will lead to critical fire weather conditions in the eastern panhandle and western Sandhills. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE AND WESTERN SANDHILLS... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity and gusty winds, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR. * TIMING...In effect from 1 PM CDT through 7 PM CDT. * WINDS...Southwest to west 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid to upper 70s. * IMPACTS...Any fires which may start, have a high probability for rapid spread and may be difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
